Mosaic Layouts

These layouts use the mosaic() layout mode to create various patterns.
Fixed layouts display a specific number of items.

8 Items

Mosaic scatter

Square items arranged in an artistic, non-traditional pattern across a 12x12 grid with overlapping and scattered positioning <lay-out md="columns(2)" lg="grid(4c)" xl="mosaic(scatter)">

Mosaic hex

Square items arranged in an artistic, non-traditional pattern across a 12x12 grid with overlapping and scattered positioning <lay-out md="columns(2)" lg="grid(4d)" xl="mosaic(hex)">
